com.comphenix.xp.listeners

Class PlayerInteractionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.xp.listeners.PlayerInteractionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerCleanupListener, org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class PlayerInteractionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerCleanupListener, org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Keeps track of a player's last block interaction.
    Author:
    Kristian

      • getLastRightClick

        public ItemQuery getLastRightClick(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                          java.lang.Integer maxAge)
        Retrieves the given player's most recent right click event.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player whose interaction we're looking for.
        maxAge - - the maximum age (in milliseconds) of the action. NULL indicates infinity.
        Returns:
        The most recent action within the given limit, or NULL if no such action can be found.

      • getLastRightClick

        public ItemQuery getLastRightClick(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                          java.lang.Integer maxAge,
                          long currentTime)
        Retrieves the given player's most recent right click event.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player whose interaction we're looking for.
        maxAge - - the maximum age (in milliseconds) of the action. NULL indicates infinity.
        currentTime - - the current time in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970.
        Returns:
        The most recent action within the given limit, or NULL if no such action can be found.

      • hasLastRightClick

        public boolean hasLastRightClick(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Determines if a last right click event has been recorded for a given player.
        Parameters:
        player - - the given player.
        Returns:
        TRUE if a right click event has been recorded, FALSE otherwise.

      • removePlayerCache

        public void removePlayerCache(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Description copied from interface: PlayerCleanupListener
        Removes a given player from being referenced by any preset node. Must be called when a player logs out.
        Specified by:
        removePlayerCache in interface PlayerCleanupListener
        Parameters:
        player - - player to remove.
